sourcesContent:
import { Grid, Typography, TableCell, TableHead, TableRow, TableBody, TableContainer, Table, } from "@material-ui/core"; import formatMoney from "../lib/formatMoney"; export default function ProductItem({ products }) { return ( Tên SL Bán Hiện tại {products?.length ? products.map((product) => ( {product.product.name} {product.quantity} {formatMoney(product.price, 0)} {formatMoney(product.product.price, 0)} )) : null}
); }
